bill.summary:
Retain Innovation and Manufacturing Excellence (RIME) Act of 2018
This bill directs the Department of Commerce to establish a pilot grant program to help eligible manufacturers retain retiring employees for up to 90 days for the purpose of transferring job-specific skills to other employees.
